pullrequest.title: Send message to subscribers only once per connection

content.raw: @ocrave Thanks for the pull request. It looks like this doesn't change ABI, what do you think about targeting it at `gazebo7` branch instead of `default`? That way it would get released into gazebo 7 and 8.
content.html: @ocrave Thanks for the pull request. It looks like this doesn't change ABI, what do you think about targeting it at gazebo7 branch instead of default? That way it would get released into gazebo 7 and 8.
